description: Extensions and alterations to existing ground and first floor flats to create 1 x two-bedroom and 1 x five bedroom maisonettes, consisting of first and second storey double-gabled rear extension incorporating mansard roof with dormer window to rear (following removal of chimney); increase in eaves height by 1m on west elevation; single-storey side and rear extension incorporating 5no. rooflights to west elevation; part-width single-storey rear extension with lantern roof-light; 2no. rooflights to main front roof slope; 1no. second floor window to front gable; 3no. rooflights to east side roof slope;  3no. rooflights to west side roof slope;  1no. second floor window to west side gable; 1no. window opening to west elevation at first floor; 2no. openings to first floor east elevation; associated landscaping and blockpaved parking area in front garden to provide 2no. parking spaces
